attributes.action: Stand against the EU's Decision to withdraw our Opt Out to the 48-Hour Rule and ensure it never becomes law here in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today MEP's voted to Scrap the 48 - Hour Opt Out Law. I call on the PM of the United Kingdom, current or new, to Stand against this EU Policy with all vigure. I ask this on behalf of all the people in the country who take on a second Job to ensure they can meet their financial commitments.
